channel.title: Signal Processing on Fuwei's Tech Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Signal Processing on Fuwei's Tech Notes

item.title: Bundle Adjustment for LiDAR SLAM: Mathematical Formulation and Optimization
item.description: A comprehensive mathematical treatment of bundle adjustment for LiDAR SLAM, covering problem formulation, feature parameter elimination, and optimization.

item.title: Perspective-n-Point (PnP) Problem
item.description: An introduction to the Perspective-n-Point (PnP) problem.

item.title: Understanding FAST-LIO: Supplementary Derivations and Explanations
item.description: A detailed derivation complementing the Fast LIO paper.

item.title: Iterative Closest Point Uncovered: Mathematical Foundations and Applications
item.description: A detailed derivation of the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) problem.

item.title: Radar Signal Processing: A Tutorial
item.description: A tutorial on radar signal processing and the article is partially generated by ChatGPT-o1

item.title: Pose Tracking with Iterative Extended Kalman Filter
item.description: Pose Tracking with Iterative Extended Kalman Filter

item.title: Position Filtering with Ego Motion Compensation
item.description: Object's position tracking with ego motion compensation.

item.title: Angle Kalman Filter
item.description: Angle Kalman filter with motion compensation.

item.title: Rolling Shutter Camera Projection
item.description: How to project LiDAR points onto a rolling shutter camera.

item.title: Camera Projection via View Frustum Culling
item.description: Project a 3D object onto the camera plane with view frustum

item.title: The Assignment Problem and Primal-Dual Algorithm
item.description: Hungarian algorithm, prime-dual interpretation, and the gated Hungarian algorithm
